name: Mini Z Racers Turbo
description: Engage in a fantastic mini race in unexpected places. Choose your favorite ZRacer and fight your way through 16 tracks in 4 awesome worlds. Grab ZBags and unleash power-ups on your foes!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher) Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, DirectX 9 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
